document_data.name: ''Fist of the Legion''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fists of the Legion''''' were [[enchanted]] [[mace]]s created to be used against [[orc]]s who once menaced the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Powers: These bludgeons bore a ''1'' enchantment that guided the welder's hand toward the target and dealt additional magical damage upon a hit. Additionally, a ''Fist of the Legion'' had a [[coin]]-toss of a chance to stun and daze a creature it struck.
document_data.History:
These weapons dated back to the {{YearlinkName|1235}}, when they were forged to be wielded by the [[Sword Coast Legion]], a militaristic organization consisting of [[cleric]]s and [[paladin]]s against growing orcish attacks on the settlements of the Sword Coast.

In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, a ''Fists of the Legion'' was wielded by a member of the Shadow Cultists who worshiped the [[King of Shadows]] within the [[Crossroad Keep]].
